titleStmt.title: Iohn Taylor being yet unhanged sends greeting to Iohn Booker that hanged him lately in a picture, in a traiterous, slanderous, and foolish London pamphlet called A cable-rope double-twisted
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: A scurrilous denunciation of Booker and all his works, in Taylor's usual style.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
